Container.Name: self-service-password
Container.Overview:
elf Service Password is a PHP application that allows users to change their password in an LDAP directory.
The application can be used on standard LDAPv3 directories (OpenLDAP, OpenDS, ApacheDS, Sun Oracle DSEE, Novell, etc.) and also on Active Directory.
Container.Description:
elf Service Password is a PHP application that allows users to change their password in an LDAP directory.
The application can be used on standard LDAPv3 directories (OpenLDAP, OpenDS, ApacheDS, Sun Oracle DSEE, Novell, etc.) and also on Active Directory.

Config.Name: Host Port 1
Config.Description: Container Port: 80

Config.Name: /www/ssp
Config.Description: Root SelfService Password Directory

Config.Name: /www/logs
Config.Description: Nginx and php-fpm logfiles

Config.Name: LDAP_SERVER
Config.Description: Ldap server. No default.

Config.Name: LDAP_STARTTLS
Config.Description: Enable TLS on Ldap bind. No default.

Config.Name: LDAP_BINDDN
Config.Description: Ldap bind dn. No default.

Config.Name: LDAP_BINDPASS
Config.Description: Ldap bind password. No default.

Config.Name: LDAP_BASE_SEARCH
Config.Description: Base where we can search for users. No default.

Config.Name: LDAP_LOGIN_ATTRIBUTE
Config.Description: Ldap property used for user searching. Defaults to uid

Config.Name: LDAP_FULLNAME_ATTRIBUTE
Config.Description: Ldap property to get user fullname. Defaults to cn

Config.Name: ADMODE
Config.Description: Specifies if LDAP server is Active Directory LDAP server. If your LDAP server is AD, set this to true. Defaults to false

Config.Name: AD_OPT_FORCE_UNLOCK
Config.Description: Force account unlock when password is changed. Default to false.

Config.Name: AD_OPT_FORCE_PWD_CHANGE
Config.Description: Force user change password at next login. Defaults to false.

Config.Name: AD_OPT_CHANGE_EXPIRED_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Allow user with expired password to change password. Defaults to false.

Config.Name: SAMBA_MODE
Config.Description: Samba mode, if is true update sambaNTpassword and sambaPwdLastSet attributes too; if is false just update the password. Defaults to false.

Config.Name: SHADOW_OPT_UPDATE_SHADOWLASTCHANGE
Config.Description: If true update shadowLastChange. Defaults to false.

Config.Name: PASSWORD_HASH
Config.Description: Hash mechanism for password SSHA SHA SMD5 MD5 CRYPT clear (the default) auto (will check the hash of current password) This option is not used with ad_mode = true

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH
Config.Description: Minimal length. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MAX_LENGTH
Config.Description: Maximal length. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MIN_LOWERCASE
Config.Description: Minimal lower characters. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MIN_UPPERCASE
Config.Description: Minimal upper characters. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MIN_DIGIT
Config.Description: Minimal digit characters. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIAL
Config.Description: Minimal special characters. Defaults to 0 (unchecked).

Config.Name: PASSWORD_NO_REUSE
Config.Description: Don't reuse the same password as currently. Defaults to true.

Config.Name: PASSWORD_SHOW_POLICY
Config.Description: Show policy constraints message always never onerror. Defaults to never

Config.Name: PASSWORD_SHOW_POLICY_POSITION
Config.Description: Position of password policy constraints message above below - the form. Defaults to above

Config.Name: WHO_CAN_CHANGE_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Who changes the password? Also applicable for question/answer save user: the user itself manager: the above binddn. Defaults to user

Config.Name: QUESTIONS_ENABLED
Config.Description: Use questions/answers? true or false. Defaults to true

Config.Name: LDAP_MAIL_ATTRIBUTE
Config.Description: LDAP mail attribute. Defaults to mail

Config.Name: MAIL_FROM
Config.Description: Who the email should come from. Defaults to admin@example.com

Config.Name: MAIL_FROM_NAME
Config.Description: Name for MAIL_FROM. Defaults to No Reply

Config.Name: NOTIFY_ON_CHANGE
Config.Description: Notify users anytime their password is changed. Defaults to false

Config.Name: SMTP_DEBUG
Config.Description: SMTP debug mode (following https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer instructions). Defaults to 0

Config.Name: SMTP_HOST
Config.Description: SMTP host. No default.

Config.Name: SMTP_AUTH_ON
Config.Description: Force smtp auth with SMTP_USER and SMTP_PASS. Defaults to false

Config.Name: SMTP_USER
Config.Description: SMTP user. No default.

Config.Name: SMTP_PASS
Config.Description: SMTP password. No default.

Config.Name: SMTP_PORT
Config.Description: SMTP port. Defaults to 587

Config.Name: SMTP_SECURE_TYPE
Config.Description: SMTP secure type to use. ssl or tls. Defaults to tls

Config.Name: LOGO
Config.Description: Main Logo - Default images/ltb-logo.png

Config.Name: BACKGROUND
Config.Description: Change background Default images/unsplash-space.jpg

Config.Name: USE_SMS
Config.Description: Enable sms notify. (Disabled on this image). Defaults to false

Config.Name: IS_BEHIND_PROXY
Config.Description: Enable reset url parameter to accept reverse proxy. Defaults to false

Config.Name: SHOW_HELP
Config.Description: Display help messages. Defaults to true

Config.Name: LANG
Config.Description: Language (NOT WORKING YET). Defaults to en.

Config.Name: DEBUG_MODE
Config.Description: Debug mode. Defaults to false.

Config.Name: SECRETEKEY
Config.Description: Encryption, decryption keyphrase. Defaults to secret.

Config.Name: USE_RECAPTCHA
Config.Description: Use Google reCAPTCHA http://www.google.com/recaptcha Defaults to false

Config.Name: RECAPTCHA_PUB_KEY
Config.Description: Go on the site to get public key

Config.Name: RECAPTCHA_PRIV_KEY
Config.Description: Go on the site to get private key

Config.Name: RECAPTCHA_THEME
Config.Description: Theme of ReCaptcha. Default: light

Config.Name: RECAPTCHA_TYPE
Config.Description: Type of ReCaptcha Default: image

Config.Name: RECAPTCHA_SIZE
Config.Description: Size of ReCaptcha Default: small

Config.Name: DEFAULT_ACTION
Config.Description: Default actionchange sendtoken sendsms. Defaults to change

Config.Name: USE_TOKENS
Config.Description: Use email to send reset tokens. Defaults to true
